actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the authorization of the Skagit River Levee and Channel Improvement Project.

summary.text: Modifies the authorization of the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a flood control project for the Skagit River Basin, Washington, to include the authorization for additional flood protection upstream to and including Sedro Woolley, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to modify the authorization of the Skagit River Levee and Channel Improvement Project.
